data.name: Global Azure 2020 - Washington DC
data.description:
The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthusiasts.
The Washington DC edition will take place on April 25th in the Arlington Tech eXchange (ATX)

relatedRecords.description: Mobile is hosting a Code Camp at the University of South Alabama on August 8th 2020! This is a FREE, one day event with 16 speakers! relatedRecords.name: Community Building: Level Up WI
relatedRecords.location: Ho-Chunk Casino Hotel and Convention Center
relatedRecords.description: Level Up is a new community event coming to Wisconsin Dells, WI on April 16 & 17 (post-Tax Day!) bringing a whole day of Deep Dive learning about Microsoft Dynamics GP and Power Platform.
